creator: jesus@aplsoftware.com
text: I have made some spanish translations. Where do I send them?.

creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
text:
The attachment looks like a jar file.  You need to submit your patch as 
a 'diff' file (preferably using 'cvs diff') if you want it to be considered.

creator: remm@apache.org
text: Fixed. Thanks. Indeed, submitting a diff is a lot better.

Created attachment 9991
New file for jakarta-servletapi-5 jsr154
